title: Ask Steve, J-Lo, Morris Chestnut, Voter Registration Day and more.
itunes:title: Ask Steve, J-Lo, Morris Chestnut, Voter Registration Day and more.
description:
Today's show is dedicated to all the chicken farmers.  We have a very special edition of Ask Steve.  RHOA star Kenya Moore is divorcing her husband.  J-Lo drops jaws in Milan and Terrence Howard got his star in Hollywood.  An Orlando police officer is fired for arresting two 6 year olds.  Our friend Morris Chestnut stops by to talk about his show on Fox.  National Voter Registration Day is today and we encourage all to utilize their power.  The month of September is National Sickle Cell Awareness Month and our very own Junior highlights the strides that have been made and also speaks to us about his Kier's Hope Foundation.  Today in Closing Remarks, The CEO talks about forming a relationship with God and its importance to success, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
